asap.realizer.scheduler

Class BMLScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.scheduler.BMLScheduler

  • public final class BMLScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    BMLScheduler, handles BML block states, feedback listeners and maintains engines and anticipators. A scheduling strategy needs to be provided to hand off the actual scheduling to.
    Author:
    Herwin van Welbergen
